title: Cant connect to chat service??

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body: So for the past few hours i haven't been able to play with any of my friends because its just saying "logging onto chat services" at the bottom of the client. none of my friends that i have asked have this issue help???

replies.body: There were some issues going on with the EUW chat service yesterday, which should be resolved by now. Let me know if you're still experiencing this issue.
Please riot answer, i'm having the same issues.  Good day and thanks ^^
